name: Documentation Sync
description: Automatically update documentation when source files change

action.prompt:
Source files have been modified. Please review the changes and update the following documentation as needed:

1. README.md - Update setup instructions, features, or usage if the changes affect user-facing functionality
2. docs/ folder - Update any relevant documentation files based on the code changes
3. .kiro/steering/ files - Update the following steering documents if the changes affect:
   - product.md - If features, business logic, or product capabilities changed
   - structure.md - If project structure, file organization, or conventions changed  
   - tech.md - If technology stack, dependencies, or development guidelines changed
4. .kiro/specs/signaturecraft-saas/ files - Update the following spec documents if the changes affect:
   - requirements.md - If implementation details have changed or new requirements have been identified
   - design.md - If architecture, component designs, or data models have evolved
   - tasks.md - Update implementation tasks, marking completed items (with âœ…) and adjusting future tasks

Focus on keeping documentation accurate and up-to-date with the current codebase. Only update sections that are actually affected by the changes.
